amendment.purpose: Amendments en bloc comprised of the following amendments printed in Part D of House Report 117-241 as en bloc No. 3: Nos. 6, 7, 13, 26, 27, 28, 29, 30, 37, 45, 79, 80, 92, 94, 96, 106, 110, 116, 121, 155, 164, 165, 180, 181, 182, 183, 185, 186, 188, 198, 199, 217, 240, 244, and 261.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lofgren amendments (A004) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 204 - 225 (Roll no. 20).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A004) pursuant to the rule.
Amendments en bloc (A004) offered by Ms. Lofgren.
